Package com.thomsonreuters.corptech.charts

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AnimationDelegate
    Delegate for animation events
    AnimationEffect
    Callback interface/protocol for an animation effect.
    AxisLayout
    An axis layout is used to calcualte the default data transform for an axis.
    ColorSource
    Provides a means to override the color source for each displayed datum.
    ConstraintBehaviour
    Provides the ability to adjust the charts transform after any movement event.
    ContinuousDataSource<T>  
    DateFormatter
    Formatter for dates
    DateTickCalculator
    Callback interface for calculating the tick interval for a date axis
    LineStyleSource
    Provides a means to override the line style for each displayed datum.
    LogHandler
    Callback interface for logging
    NumberFormatter
    Callback interface for number formatting
    NumberTickCalculator
    Callback interface for calculating the tick interval for a number axis
    RangeCalculator
    A range calculator is used to define the default range of a data series.
    Renderable
    Base interface/protocol for objects with a visual representation
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractDateFormatter
    Format a date using either the platform formatting mechanism or c-standard library mechanism (dependent on syntax property)
    AbstractNumberAxis
    Base class for axes that display numbers
    Animation
    An animation describes a series of effects that are applied over a duration.
    AreaSeries
    A series that displays the area under scalar datums.
    Attachable
    Base class for all objects that can be attached to each other (eg a series can be attached to a chart)
    AutomaticDateTickCalculator
    WARNING: This is an automatically generated wrapper around a native object; overriding methods will not work as expected.
    AutomaticNumberTickCalculator
    Calculates a number tick interval based on a target screen-space interval.
    Axis
    Base axis class, see concrete implementations for more details
    BandSeries
    A series that displays range datums as a band.
    BaseObject
    Base for all autogenerated classes.
    BasicDateFormatter
    Format a date (see AbstractDateFormatter)
    BasicNumberFormatter
    Format a number using a set number of decimal spaces (using the platform current locale)
    CandlestickSeries
    A series that displays OHLC datums as candlesticks.
    CategoryAxis
    An axis for displaying categories, eg for bar charts (not currently implemented/used)
    Chart
    Root container for all chart objects.
    ChartElement
    Base class for all objects that can be attached to a chart
    Color
    Represents an RGBA color (values range between 0-255)
    Constraint
    Allows a constraint behaviour to be attached to a chart.
    ContinuousAxis
    A continuous axis
    ContinuousDatum
    Continuous datums have two co-ordinates, an abscissa (usually X) and an ordinate (usually Y), although X and Y can be flipped using axis association.
    ContinuousSeries<T>
    WARNING: This is an automatically generated wrapper around a native object; overriding methods will not work as expected.
    Coordinates
    Represents a data point (independent of datum type).
    DataFittingAxisLayout
    An axis layout that tries to fit all available data into the visible area.
    DataOffsetConstraintBehaviour
    Constrain the data scale for a given set of axes, such that the axis cannot be panned further than the total data range.
    DataScaleConstraintBehaviour
    Constrain the data scale for a given set of axes, such that the axis cannot be zoomed out further than the total data range.
    DataTransform
    A data-space transformation, could be visualized as a transform matrix (but without a rotation component)
    DateAxis
    An axis that displays date ticks.
    DateInterval
    Combines a date unit and magnitude
    Decoration
    Base class for a chart decoration
    Drawable
    Base class for all objects that can be drawn
    FadeInEffect
    Fade the targeted drawables into view (opacity from 0% to 100%)
    FadeOutEffect
    Fade the targeted drawables out of view (opacity from 100% to 0%)
    FixedDateTickCalculator
    Date tick calculator implementation that returns a constant pre-specified tick interval
    FixedNumberTickCalculator
    Number tick calculator implementation that returns a constant pre-specified tick interval
    FixedRangeCalculator
    A range calculator that always returns a fixed range.
    Font
    Represents a font
    IncludeZeroRangeCalculator
    A range calculator that expands the supplied range such that it always includes the value 0.
    IndexRange
    Represents an integer start and end index (start:inclusive, end:exclusive)
    Label
    Combines a text value and its visual style.
    LineDecoration
    Draws a line at a fixed data position on a given axis
    LineSeries
    A series that displays scalar datums as a line.
    LineStyle
    Represents a line style
    Margin
    Represents 4 edges (for margin/padding/etc)
    NumberAxis
    An axis that displays uniformly spaced (linear) number ticks.
    OHLC
    An open/high/low/close value.
    OHLCDatum
    A continuous datum holding open/high/low/close values.
    PaddingRangeCalculator
    A range calculator that expands the supplied range in both directions by a padding value (must be specified in data coordinates).
    PerUnitDateFormatter
    Format a date differently for the closest unit.
    Point
    Represents a 2D point.
    PointDecoration
    Draws a point at a fixed data position on a given pair of axes
    PointSeries
    A series that displays scalar datums as disconnected points.
    PointStyle
    Represents a point style
    Range
    An inclusive range in the real number domain.
    RangeDatum
    A continuous datum holding range values.
    ScalarDatum
    A continuous datum holding scalar (number) values
    Series
    WARNING: This is an automatically generated wrapper around a native object; overriding methods will not work as expected.
    Size
    Represents a 2D size.
    SteppedAreaSeries
    A series that displays the stepped area under scalar datums.
    SteppedBandSeries
    A series that displays range datums as a stepped band.
    SteppedLineSeries
    A series that displays scalar datums as a stepped line.
    SuffixNumberFormatter
    Extends BasicNumberFormatter, to also display the relevant metric suffix (by default)
    TickAligningRangeCalculator
    If this range calculator is used with the AutomaticNumberTickCalculator, it will produce a range that can be automatically aligned (that is, it will be aligned to a power of 2 and 5)
    Touch
    Representation of a single touch
    Transform
    A screen-space transform
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    DateUnit
    Unit for date calcualations and display
    Edge
    Represents the chart edge where an axis is drawn.
    FontHint
    Font rendering hints.
    FormatSyntax
    Formating mode (for dates/numbers)
    LineMode
    Line style mode.
    LogLevel
    Log level, each log level implies that level, and all more severe levels
    ResizeMode
    Controls what happens when the chart area is resized.
